summary: Successfully implemented comprehensive manual editing and result confirmation functionality. Added inline field editing for all major company fields (industry, funding, employee count, location, founded year, description, phone), result confirmation system with visual indicators, enhanced statistics dashboard with 6 metrics including confirmed results and modified entries, bulk actions panel for saving all changes, and improved UX with real-time updates, keyboard shortcuts, and visual feedback. Users can now manually edit any field, confirm result accuracy, and track validation progress.
current_status: The enrichment screen now provides complete manual control over the enrichment process with comprehensive editing, confirmation, and validation capabilities. Combined with all previous features (dynamic column suggestions, search functionality, CSV parsing, link processing, second iteration workflow, Telegram group integration, and newsletter subscription), the application offers a full-featured market intelligence platform with professional data validation and editing capabilities.
